content: Hello, here is my first PR #29060. Refactored argument ordering for LSeries_congr in NumberTheory/LSeries. Nothing fancy here, just looking at simple TODOs, tryring to understand repo structure and content. Hope it will make things a bit better and more aligned with general Mathlib guidelines
@Michael Stoll I have applied your suggestions. Please, take a look at PR once again when you have time :)
